=====
close
=====

.. js:function:: close() 

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

Call ``—Ålose`` to close an item dataset. After dataset is closed the 
:doc:`active <at_active>` 
property is ``false``.

See also
========

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`

:doc:`open <m_open>`
